title: U.S. opinion poll : sexiest musical instrument 2014
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Guitar and lowest at Response Flute.
The highest Response Guitar has 21.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Flute.
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Guitar has the highest Share of respondents and Flute has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Guitar and lowest at Response Flute.
The highest Response Guitar has 21.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Flute.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 6 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 26.0 is found at Response Guitar and the minimum is found at Flute where Response is 5.0.
The second highest Share of respondents is appeared to be the Response Saxophone.
The Share of respondents of Response Flute is 5.2% smaller than the maximum value at Guitar.
Response Guitar is higher than any other Responses with value 26.0, followed by Saxophone, and Piano. Down to Response Flute with the lowest value 5.0.
The Response Guitar has 1.59 times more Share of respondents than average.
The Share of respondents is 98.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
